official_title: A bill entitled, the "Tributyltin-Based Antifouling Paint Control Act of 1987".
short_title: Tributyltin-Based Antifouling Paint Control Act of 1987

summary.text: Tributyltin-Based Antifouling Paint Control Act of 1987 - Prohibits the use of paints containing tributyltin as an antifouling paint for painting any vessel if such paints have a steady-state release rate above a certain level. Defines "vessel" as any ship, boat, watercraft, or other marine structure. Establishes civil penalties for violations of this Act.
